name: Rage Against The Dice
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022
The topic was Roll of the Dice

Manipulate the Game with your Dice Cannon!

The game is based on the german board game "Mensch ärgere dich nicht" (Man, don't get angry), which is a descendant of Pachisi,  just like Parcheesi and Ludo. Four simulated players roll the dice and try to win. Your goal is to score points and keep the game going. You do this by shooting the pieces with your dice cannon.

Note: You can play the game in 2 different modes, because the playtesters couldn't decide if the  cannon should rotate or not

Controls:

Note: Theres also an in-game tutorial explaining the controls and rules

Move Clockwise: A, LeftArrow
Move Counter-Clockwise: D, RightArrow
Shoot: Space, K, X, Left Mouse Button
Slow Down:  Shift, Right Mouse Button

Made with Godot
